description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Controdazone! It’s "Control" + "The" + "Zone", get it? This game is a twin stick shooter with a twist. Instead of killing your opponents you fight vigorously for control over the “zone”, a circular area that travels around the screen. Battle with up to 4 friends, or hone your skills against the bots. Grab power ups to give you an edge in battle. Only 80 points to play forever!
description.short: Controdazone! It’s "Control" + "The" + "Zone", get it? This game is a twin stick shooter with a twist. Instead of killing your opponents you fight vigorously for control over the “zone”, a circular area that travels around the screen. Battle with up to 4 friends, or hone your skills against the bots. Grab power ups to give you an edge in battle. Only 80 points to play forever!
